prompt:
Meeting transcript:
{transcript_chunk}
Write the lists of tasks that each speaker completed before the meeting. Do not include things done during the meeting.
The tasks has to be clearly reported as finished by the speaker. Do not mention future plans.
Only give one list of completed tasks for each speaker without any extra information. Provide only the list with title 'Completed tasks for each speaker' and no additional comments. Make structured lists with name of each speaker as title and bullet points for each separate task of this speaker.
goals: Extracts lists of completed tasks already finished by each meeting participant from meeting transcripts.
